report.title: EBMS Scheme Users Sample Details
report.description: List of users, and the numbers of samples and training samples they have created.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id = l.id JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_id = l.id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #country_loc_attr_id# AND lav.int_value = #coordinator_country_id# AND lav.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_samples_functional csf on csf.location_id = l.id AND csf.survey_id=#survey_id# AND csf.location_id = l.id JOIN users u on u.id = csf.created_by_id JOIN users_websites uw on u.id=uw.user_id AND uw.site_role_id IS NOT NULL JOIN people p on p.id = u.person_id AND p.deleted = false LEFT JOIN users_websites accesscheck on accesscheck.website_id=uw.website_id AND accesscheck.user_id=#auth_user_id# AND accesscheck.site_role_id<3 WHERE l.deleted = false AND l.location_type_id in (#location_type_ids#) AND #website_filter#

param.name: location_type_ids
param.description: List of location types to include

param.name: country_loc_attr_id
param.description: ID of the location attribute that hold's a transects country

param.name: coordinator_country_id
param.description: ID of the country the coordinator is associated with

column.name: person_name
column.sql: CASE WHEN p.first_name IS NULL THEN p.surname ELSE p.surname || ', ' || p.first_name END

column.name: email_address
column.sql: CASE WHEN accesscheck.id IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE p.email_address END

column.name: samples_this_year
column.sql: count(csf.id) filter ( where csf.training = false AND ((csf.created_on >= CAST(date_part('year', now()) || '-01-01' as date)) AND (csf.created_on <= CAST(date_part('year', now()) || '-12-31' as date))))

column.name: training_samples_this_year
column.sql: count(csf.id) filter ( where csf.training = true AND ((csf.created_on >= CAST(date_part('year', now()) || '-01-01' as date)) AND (csf.created_on <= CAST(date_part('year', now()) || '-12-31' as date))))
